Key Match Events: Davis reached the 30-point plateau for the eighth time in 12 games played this season.
James responded with consecutive 3s to put the Lakers up 101-97 with 37 seconds left after Ingram gave the Pelicans a late two-point lead.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Anthony Davis had 31 points and 14 rebounds
LeBron James had a 21-point performance with a pair of pivotal 3-pointers in the final minutes
Rookie Dalton Knecht hit five 3s to finish with a career-high 27 points
The Lakers outscored the Pelicans in the paint, 52-40
